programme.desc: Téann Cody agus a chara nua Cece ag spaisteoireacht. (Cody and his new friend Cece go for a walk.)

programme.title: CoComelon JJ's Animal
programme.desc: Is breá leis an triúr seo ceol a sheinm a chéile. (There are 3 little friends and their favourite thing to do is play music instruments together.)

programme.title: Rita & Crogall
programme.desc: Ní mharaíonn Rita mórán nuair a théann sí féin agus Crogall ag iascach. (When Rita and Crocodile go fishing, Rita doesn't do very well.)

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Tá rún ag Cory agus Freddie fanacht ina ndúiseacht go dtí meán oíche. (Cory and Freddie hatch a plan to stay awake until midnight.)

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: Oíche Shamhna atá ann agus tá na Meicneoirí ag imirt bob nó bia. (The Mechanics go trick or treating on Halloween.)

programme.title: Abby's Amazing Adventure
programme.desc: Beidh Abby agus Rudy ina ndearthóirí grafaice inniu. (Abby and Rudy are going to be graphic designers today.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Tá Posy ag iarraidh a chur ina luí ar Phip bréagán a mhalartú ach ní mó ná sásta a bhíonn sí ar deireadh. (Posy persuades Pip to swap toys for keeps in Swapsies.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Feiceann Bobble réalta uaigneach sa spéir. (Bobble spots a lonely star in the sky.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Scéal an Lae
programme.desc: Is í Niamh Ní Chróinín a bheidh ag léamh scéal an lae inniu. (Today's story of the day is read by Niamh Ní Chróinín.)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Is breá le Cody a phluidín. (Cody loves to play with his blankie.)

programme.title: CoComelon JJ's Animal
programme.desc: Tá JJ ag spaisteoireacht sa gcoill le ciseán lán le bia. (JJ is skipping through the forest with a basket full of food.)

programme.title: Rita & Crogall
programme.desc: An mbeidh Rita agus Crogall in ann gráinneog a aimsiú i ngairdín Mhamó? (Will Rita and Crocodile be able to find a hedgehog in Granny's garden?)

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cuireann Cory aithne ar Winifred Eiteach. (Cory makes a new friend in Winifred Wings.)

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: Tá maighnéad nua ag an Uasal Easóige agus tá na Meicneoirí an-tógtha leis. (Mr. Weasel has a new magnet, and all the Mechanics are very impressed.)

programme.title: Elmo Anseo
programme.desc: Foghlaimeoidh Elmo agus a chara nua Cliste tuilleadh faoi Lá na nAithreacha inniu. (Elmo explores and discovers more about Father's Day with his new friend, Smartie.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Níl solas oíche Pip ag obair agus ní maith leis an dorchadas. (Pip's night light stops working and he reveals he is nervous of the dark.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Déanfaidh na hOlobobanna dineasár le cúnamh a thabhairt d'éinín óg a chur ar ais sa nead. (The Olobobs create Stepasnorus to help return the baby bird to its nest.)
